website_summaries.verdict: If you are thirsty for traditional iced tea that comes from brewing your own, Luzianne is both flavorful and affordable. It's also been a favorite among iced tea lovers for generations.
pros: Classic tea bags by a longtime popular brand
Tea is blended to produce excellent, traditional  flavor
Value priced, as there are enough tea bags to make several gallons
cons: Some packs had flavor that seemed stale
Tea leaves can spill out of the bags during brewing, and end up in the tea

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: This item is advertised as a box of 22 teabags, PACK OF 6. However I was sent one pack. The pricing per ounce of .92/oz also reflects a pack of 6. $20 for one box of tea is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Yuck! Old tea bags
customer_reviews.text: I love Luzianne and had ordered this same item of boxed family sized tea bags from Amazon and they were normal. However - last order was AWFUL. Undrinkable. You could taste rancid oils and all the tea batches were cloudy and unusually dark. My 13 yr old asked what was wrong with the tea and she hardly notices anything - I tried every box we ordered and all were the same. Off smell. Old. Wasted money. :(
customer_reviews.author: Aliea

customer_reviews.title: Short changed
customer_reviews.text: I can’t find who to contact but I only got one of the 6 ordered be careful
customer_reviews.author: cheryl a lubbers

customer_reviews.title: Love this hibiscus tea
customer_reviews.text: Great tea. The first time I made it, according to package directions, it was pretty tasteless. Next time I added another bag (3 total) and steeped for 7 minutes longer. Really like the flavor. I don't even use any sweetener and I could drink it all day. Love it. Update: I started using 2 teabags (to conserve my supply ;-) and steeping 12 minutes. Great tea! I love the (slight) tartness, and add just a little Stevia. Luzianne is the absolute best tea. Also love their decaf black. (Unfortunately, the tea does not help my BP at all.)
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: A Family Favorite for over 50 years
customer_reviews.text: When our local stores were out of Luzianne tea I decided to try Amazon. Got my tea very quickly, checked the freshness and was pleased to find it was over two years till the best by date. Couldn't be happier. Our family has used Luzianne tea for over 50 years and nothing else has the iced tea flavor we love. I will continue to get my tea here, as a side bonus the price beat our local grocery by quite a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Sour but effective
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this since it is known for helping lower blood pressure and it did! My issue is that it is sour and needs a lot of sweetener to make it tasty enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna M. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Lovely color and flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I first found at Walmart. Loved it..made for friends...they loved it. Then I couldn't find it again and had to buy on Amazon. It was around $2 a box at Walmart so paying more on Amazon hurt. But it's worth every penny. In warm months I use 5 tea bags per gallon. While hot I add 4 tablespoons of Pyure which is a organic blend of Stevia and erithritrol. Makes great iced tea but also good hot. I made a gallon using 4 teabags for hot tea for a Valentine's day tea. It's a lovely color. Loved by all my guy friends.
customer_reviews.author: just ME

customer_reviews.title: OLD TEA!  TERR(BLE, TASTES LIKE THE WORST OF THE DOLLAR STORE OR COUNTERFEIT!
customer_reviews.text: I won't drink anything else for about the last 50 years. Everyone compliments my tea because this brand is uncommon here. I ordered 4 boxes dated 1 year and 10 months in the future, it was awful. Tea brewed up to muddy, dark, cloudy color with a nasty, strong, musty, almost dirt taste! The bags themselves were off-color almost grey and they did not smell of fresh, wonderful Luzianne Iced Tea. My kids, all adults, asked me where I bought counterfeit Luzianne! Just awful! Getting ready to try the 2nd box, same date. If it is not better will send all back and order from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: dwells

customer_reviews.title: Good Value by the Case Lot of 6 Boxes
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality tea, reaching a very dark red color almost immediately when brewed by the cup. Ingredients hibiscus only. One bag produces 4 - 8 oz. servings, or a quart of tea. I use 1 bag to a 16 oz. cup of hot water (3x day) to strengthen the health benefits to help my blood pressure and for hydration. Also, good by the quart, cold, with a little erythritol for cutting the edge on the naturally bitter/sour taste. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I'm sold on Luzianne tea. I've tried other brands and this seems like the best value and best flavor. I live in the South and iced tea is pretty much the regional non-alcoholic drink of choice. A lot of restaurants in the South serve Luzianne tea. I recommend without question. Here's a quick way to make a couple of servings: Place three of these bags in 16 to 24 oz of cold water. (I use a large mason jar.) Let steep for an hour to three hours. It will brew slowly, not get bitter and you need less ice to chill it.
customer_reviews.author: David EckTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Caffeine-free, sugar-free alternative to kool-aid.  A great evening beverage!
customer_reviews.text: I brew this tea using two bags in a half-gallon pitcher for 7-10 minutes, sweetened with less than a quarter-cup of Truvia, and skipping the instructions to dilute with additional water. This is a great alternative to kool-aid!
customer_reviews.author: DJinVAB

customer_reviews.title: Yummy iced tea.
customer_reviews.text: Better than what Momma used to make! I grew up on Lipton's ... which is fine. There's nothing wrong with Lipton's for iced tea. I just happen to prefer Luzianne. I especially like the larger tea bags because I make my tea a gallon at a time. I remember growing up and wrestling 7-8 individual tea bags to make a jug of tea. If you want to get really fancy, add a pinch of baking soda in the brewing process to make your tea extra smooth.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Janicki

customer_reviews.title: Great Cold Brewed Tea
customer_reviews.text: My guys throw one of these in a gallon pitcher of water with 40 drops of liquid sucralose (we use EZ Sweet), just 8-12 hours in the fridge and voila! Perfect tea every time. We learned the secret of Cold Brewed Tea at the Turkey Hill Experience! Haven’t made it any other way since!
customer_reviews.author: Birdfield Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic in the summer, and good for you too!
customer_reviews.text: My local store stopped carrying this hibiscus tea and I couldn't find it elsewhere. Of course, I should have checked Amazon first! Cheaper than what I was paying in store and now I won't ever run out. This makes a fantastic summer beverage. I make it a bit stronger than the directions say, add fresh mint leaves to the hot water and strain out with the teabags, then add some agave nectar to taste. Hibiscus is so darned tart some type of sweetener has to be used, and I found agave much better than honey. Agave has a bit of a maple flavor to it that really does the trick in this tea, but a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: Best tea for Iced Tea
customer_reviews.text: we use these tea bags for Iced Tea and it makes the Perfect pitcher of Iced Tea every time!! 4 of these tea bags and 1.5 cups of Splenda or your favorite sugar free sweetener and you have the Perfect sugar free gallon of ice tea. I use a tea kettle and boil water, then let the tea bags sit in a glass measuring cup for 30 minutes with the Splenda. this way you're not letting the tea boil. If the tea comes to a boil, that is what allows it to taste sour fast, so don't boil your tea. :D Only boil the water and you'll start having the most consistent and amazing iced tea you've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Murphy

customer_reviews.title: ) It is weak when you make it as directed (5 minutes cold brewing) so I let it sit as much as 20 minutes and it is better. Great product to keep in your office desk
customer_reviews.text: I use these at work because when I drink regular tea (which we make and keep in the break room) I drink it so fast I end up with a caffeine rush. I start mixing this (which I can make quietly in my office and keep in my mini-fridge) with the caffeinated brewed tea, and stay calm in the afternoon :) It is weak when you make it as directed (5 minutes cold brewing) so I let it sit as much as 20 minutes and it is better. Great product to keep in your office desk.
customer_reviews.author: Cafali

customer_reviews.title: Really great for sun tea!
customer_reviews.text: Usually teas don't do well as sun tea. I love sun tea. Every week I'll put out a glass jug with water and 8 tea bags for sun tea. Most teas (especially decaf teas) will take all day in the sun and will barely tint the water, making very weak tea. Even adding more bags doesn't help. But not with this tea! When I put 8 bags in my water jug for my sun tea, it takes about 2 - 3 hours in the sun for it to get really dark. The tea is really fabulous tasting. I love it! This is some great tea. Get it, especially if you like sun tea like I do!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Main

customer_reviews.title: Love that the bags are not stapled
customer_reviews.text: I usually make 1 gallon at a time, but my local grocery stores only sell "family size" tea bags so I have to use 3-4 of those, which are stapled together. Most of the time, some of the tea grains leak out of the stapled joint on at least one of the bags. These gallon bags are sealed all the way around all 4 sides, making them leak proof. I've never had an issue with the tea grains leaking out - and thus these are my new favorite way for making tea. Wish my local grocery sold these but until then, I'm buying them here to prevent tea grains in my glass and teeth.
customer_reviews.author: David N. Hollas

customer_reviews.title: Bright red and refreshing . . .
customer_reviews.text: I like it and something about the bright red color makes it seem more refreshing than regular iced tea. Started drinking because supposedly hibiscus helps lower blood pressure --- I have not found that to be the case --- but drink it now just because I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Replay888

customer_reviews.title: Luzianne Decaffeinated Tea for lifelong tea drinkers
customer_reviews.text: I like Luzianne because it never gets cloudy after brewed. I brew 1 quart at a time and put in refrigerator between uses. It is decaffeinated so I can drink it and hopefully still sleep okay. I use 1 family size tea bag/quart and you can increase number of tea bags or dilute to your taste. I have been using this product for over a decade and highly recommend Luzianne products.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: My car is out and i live in the country.
customer_reviews.text: I used Lipton tea bags for years, and they came open constantly and got tea leaves everywhere, so i tried every other brand I could find. Luzianne was the only brand i found that didnt break more than once every five years so i switched. I drink a gallon of tea a day and it sure helps to have a brand i TRUST like Luzianne. If I want Lipton tea leaves I go next door to my Moms house. i switched to Luzianne ten or more years ago and got down to the last five bags when this came it just in the nick of time. Thanks again for prompt shipment.
customer_reviews.author: N. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Ruby Red Refresher
customer_reviews.text: I used 2 bags to make 1 gallon of delightful iced tea. I boiled 2 qts of water and poured it over two hibiscus tea bags, let it steep for 10 minutes then topped with ice and cold water, I added 3/4 cups of sugar and ended up with a beautiful ruby red lightly sweetened iced tea. It has some natural tartness which I think balances the sweet beautifully. I ordered and received 6 boxes for a very reasonable $15.99 that worked out to $2.66 for each box of 22 bags. I recommend this brand of hibiscus tea and will definitely order more.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina B.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, my favorite decaf tea at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried Twinnings, Bigelow, and other 'Top Shelf' teas. Except for Bentley's No. 436 ( and they won't respond to my e-mails), there is no brand that has the flavor and is also decaf like Luzianne. I make a gallons of this tea. I have no problem getting the flavor the way I enjoy it. I find it both refreshing and satisfying. Almost every other brand does not get it. Thankyou Luzianne!
customer_reviews.author: Max Headroom

customer_reviews.title: Bitter as the day is long
customer_reviews.text: Received my box of tea bags today, the amount of tea, 6 boxes, is a great value especially compared to other hibiscus tea bags at my local grocery store. These are 100% hibiscus and are extremely sour/ bitter. If you want to drink unsweetened tea these may not be or you. I added a teaspoon of honey but really wanted to add about 3 Tablespoons. However, I resisted the urge to add more sweetener because I'm trying to use thee tea bags as a health booster. Anyway, good quality tea, great price, fresh product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Heath

customer_reviews.title: Scored on this tea....delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent tea! It is very hard to find decaf family sized tea bags specifically made for iced tea, but I would occasionally find Litpon's at Walmart and would buy a couple boxes, but their stock of this was rather hit and miss, so I thought I'd give Luzianne a try from Amazon. We have made a gallon jar of sun tea with these bags almost every single day this summer.....the tea is just perfect and stands up well to ice without getting too watered down. I use 4 bags per gallon.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Great value, and THE best iced tea
customer_reviews.text: Luzianne is THE best tea for iced tea. Don't even try another brand. This is flavorful with no sugar, though I love sweet tea. I use 2 of the large bags per gallon. I get the water almost to boil and then just steep them in it for a few minutes. I don't squeeze the bags, as I have found that makes the tea a little more bitter. I also add to the hot water, BROWN sugar (~1/4 C per gallon). Brown sugar seems to bring out more flavor in the tea. Best ice tea EVER. Cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Best home brewed tea ever.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I put one of the gallon pads in my 12 cup coffeemaker. Filling with water from a full 1 gallon of drinking water to the 12 cup line and let it brew. I let set after the brewing until the brewed tea was cooled down then poured back into the gallon container. Placed in fridge until chilled. Best product for brewed tea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work Out For Me
customer_reviews.text: At first I was yay, it's making tea right on my kitchen counter! About 5 hours later I couldn't wait to try a sip of it so I made a tall glass with a little bit of lemon sweet and that with stevia a natural sweetener and began to drink it. At first I was like ahhh, iced tea..but half an hour later my stomach began to feel queasy and I couldn't drink anymore. I thought I'd come back to it later and it would be okay but somehow I knew I better stay away from it, so the rest went down the sink. Don't know why that happened but it was a big turn-off.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best ice tea ever
customer_reviews.text: Luzianne makes the best ice tea that I've ever had. I've used it for years, almost always brewing with a Mr tea or other system. I can't live without it. When I needed to switch to decaf earlier this year, Luzianne did not let me down. This tastes just as good as their regular version. Myself, I can't tell the difference. I only need 1 family size tea bag per 3 gallon brew. I top it off with filtered water. I go through one 3-gallon pitcher a day, so yay for no caffeine. Price-wise, this was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: KLouthan

customer_reviews.title: Dream Come True
customer_reviews.text: I doubt you would believe me if I told you my household is big, and goes through a gallon of iced sweet tea a day. I never thought of ordering it by the case, but plan to keep it up! Great tasting tea!
customer_reviews.author: H. L. Cross

customer_reviews.title: Southern-Style Iced Tea At It's Best
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for southern-style iced tea, this is the only choice. Other brands may advertise their tea leaves and other facts about how it's grown but if the southern taste is what you're looking for, this is it. I have tried several brands and styles of tea bags in my quest for that "southern taste." There isn't any. Not expensive but this product is not available in Southern California, at least not in any of the supermarkets I've shopped at.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo good!!
customer_reviews.text: 8 cups of water with 2 pouches with juice of a very juicy lemon (or two, depending on my mood), and half a cup of sugar... It's the perfect mix of tea, lemon and sugar. So refreshing. 🤤 I discovered this thanks to a YouTube channel called Views on The Road. I'm gonna need a subscription cause I don't think I can go without it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Gonz

customer_reviews.title: Crisp and Fresh=The Best
customer_reviews.text: I love this Iced Tea. The flavor is perfect and so crisp and fresh tasting. Perfect for the unsweetened Iced Tea Lover. Luzianne is the only brand I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of Kings

customer_reviews.title: Economical and tasty iced tea
customer_reviews.text: I was buying this in my local grocery store but then it disappeared from the shelves. I can’t drink any other iced tea after finding Luzianne Hibiscus tea. It takes much less tea bags to brew a large amount of tea. I sweeten with stevia and add a sugar free flavor syrup for extra punch. It’s nice and sweet so it doesn’t take much. It also Makes a good mixer. I’ve mixed it with red moscato wine, with rockstar energy drink, And it’s also good mixed with Zevia soda and ice.
customer_reviews.author: C. Krupinski

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for Iced Tea...Great Price, Great Flavor, Large Tea Bags!
customer_reviews.text: Luzianne is the absolute best among the more affordable options such as Lipton, etc and comes in at a much better price, as well! Luzianne has a great, nicely balanced flavor with no weird aftertaste and there's less packaging than some of the other brands, so less waste. Plus, I love the larger "family" tea bag size for brewing larger batches at once. All in all, highly recommended if you're a true iced tea lover and don't want to spend more than necessary to brew a great tea!
customer_reviews.author: Masta' C

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and flavor
customer_reviews.text: I drink at least a gallon of iced tea a week and have been using this tea for many many years. Great taste and flavor, I have found it to be superior to all the other brands of tea. Very good price On Amazon. Are used to find it hard getting this tea in many grocery stores. But Amazon has solved that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Delicious tea, delicious price
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble finding this family size hibiscus tea bag in stores. So I was very happy to find this 6 count box of 22 family size tea bags here on Amazon. I love regular Luzianne tea and this hibiscus tea does not disappoint. Lasts me 5 months , and I don't have to hunt for them. Came right to my door! Very happy with the whole deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kimigo

customer_reviews.title: BEST taste of them all
customer_reviews.text: If Lipton tea makes you gag and you want a traditional ice tea, try this! you won't be sorry. The six box inclusion is perfect for me because I make a pot every day, with a Mr. Coffee tea maker. It's perfect for this delicious ice tea.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Very Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: We live this tea. Its very refreshing and we like it better than the regular tea. It is a little on the bitter side but we use a small amount of stevia and we also bought sugar free peach and mango syrup that we add to our individual tumblers to taste. This 6 pack is also a good value. We make a gallon at a time using 4 family bags at a time.
customer_reviews.author: smidget

customer_reviews.title: Bitter and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! Bought this because we couldn't find this brand of cold brew in the store. When I opened the package, the box was smashed and in poor condition. It had been smashed so much that there was loose tea all inside and outside the box under the plastic wrap. Also, the tea tasted extremely bitter due to the fine particles of tea that opened and got all over the other tea bags. Waste of $10!
customer_reviews.author: Polly J Austin

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Tea, more healthy, but just as tasty!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing can top this for making Southern style sweet tea, without all the caffeine and I sweeten it with Splenda or stevia, so it is completely guilt free. My family hails from Alabama, so just know that Luzianne is the real deal! If you are making real "sweet tea", there's nothing that can beat this!
customer_reviews.author: Alyosha Fan

customer_reviews.title: Taste Good Like Hibiscus Tea Should
customer_reviews.text: Nice red hibiscus color and great hibiscus flavor! Got this to reduce blood pressure and was using other brands that contained other added leaves of herbs and such that can cause liver or other problems from daily or long term use. These are family size bags, so 1 teabag makes 1 quart. Great value for the dollar getting 6 boxes too. Plan to stock up on this!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: ... tell any difference in the flavor and was very happy with that
customer_reviews.text: I can not tell any difference in the flavor and was very happy with that.. after being told by my doctor I needed to stop intake of caffeine.. ah.. I use eight bags to one gallon of water.. I let them sit in about 4 cups of very hot water for about an hour them add the rest of the gallon using cold water.. great flavor..
customer_reviews.author: Wm L Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Ugh !  BAD carton
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking this tea now for a number of years....always the BEST summer iced tea. Unique flavor. This last order has tasted bad. I think it is old, although the expiration date stamped on package is 2020. I hope they haven't changed tea source or blend. I tried a bag from all boxes in carton...all the same. I'll order another and just hope the one I got slipped quality control. I'll follow up with a report.
customer_reviews.author: Sassparilly

customer_reviews.title: Have to use 2 gallon tea bags, to make a gallon, and it taste terrible. Red Diamond, all the way!
customer_reviews.text: You need to use two gallon tea bags to make a gallon of tea, thats not just water with a hint of tea Also, poor flavor. This is not good southern tea. I drink a lot of ice tea, I thought I'd try this because its supposed to be made just for ice tea, and It came with 24 gallon bags, but when you have to use 2, it's no deal, and it taste awful. Buy Red Diamond, 12 gallons tea bags for $13. You only need 1 bag and its delicious southern tea. A lot of people have never heard of Red Diamond, it's our secret to the best tea.
customer_reviews.author: C DUB's

customer_reviews.title: Fresh tasting any way you brew it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love Luzianne iced tea. Taste is great... always fresh with NO "paper filter" taste like the tea I grew up on (Lipton). Also very easy to brew... cold water brew, hot water brew, sun tea brewed or even using an iced tea machine... all great results and fresh flavor. Cannot ever do Lipton again.
customer_reviews.author: Brookelynn K.

customer_reviews.title: This is a LOT of Tea
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews said it was expensive for what you get, but I got 6 boxes with 22 family-sized bags in each box. It's a good thing that I like it, because I'll be drinking it for a very long time. I'd never had hibiscus tea before, but the reviews said it was sour or tart. I don't find it to be either of those, but I did add a heaping tablespoon of monk fruit sweetener to the 2- batch.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. WhiteTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It's tea. It's fine.
customer_reviews.text: It's.....fine? It's bags for iced tea, so I wouldn't say there's anything extremely remarkable about it. The only reason I bought Luzianne on Amazon was because the store was completely out of tea (yay for people panic-buying during the pandemic) Good flavor, good value for the money - it doesn't brew as strong as Lipton, so probably won't repurchase for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could have more and better flavor
customer_reviews.text: Good, but could have more and better flavor. I have found the Davidson's bulk decaf to be the most flavorful for making iced tea with decaf leaves. Not as convenient though as it is in bulk form rather than bags. Worth it though if it is in stock. I like the decaf Earl Grey and decaf English Breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: W. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Cold Brew Iced Tea
customer_reviews.text: If you're trying to wean yourself off of sugar, this is a good way to go. No need to boil water. Steep the teabags in cold water overnight in the refrigerator. The result is a full-flavored tea without the bitter aftertaste. Sugar addicts can always sweeten an individual glass.
customer_reviews.author: L. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: When it comes to a cold brew, nothing but Luzianne will do!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a long time Luzianne fan, since I found out my local stores carry it. This is my first time buying the gallon-size tea bags, which will fit perfect in my 64oz mason jar pitcher. Just what I need to enjoy a cool sip of tea to unwind and enjoy my day as deserved. Thanks Amazon for carrying this! Luzianne never fails me!
customer_reviews.author: Perfectly Imperfect!

customer_reviews.title: Tears in bags
customer_reviews.text: I swear by Luzianne tea bags for our homemade sweet tea BUT every other tea bag has tears in it making sweet tea brewing a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT Tea, GREAT Price
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying the family size tea bags, 6 boxes at a time, for many years. They're routinely great tasting, fresh and very feasible (especially when compared to Lipton). What more can you ask for???
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great product that helps BP
customer_reviews.text: My blood pressure is down over 20 pts. I drink 4 cups a day. Add some Splenda. It tastes like berries. I will buy this as long as I live.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Luzianne vs Lipton
customer_reviews.text: I drink a lot of tea every day. I usually drink only Lipton but due to the Corona virus there is a shortage oF Lipton tea bags, the caffeinated family size. I didn’t think I would be satisfied with Luzianne but it’s ok. I miss my Lipton but this is a great substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We drink a lot of tea in our house, in fact about a gallon a day.. I think its a lot easier with the gallon tea bag than putting four quart tea bags in the pitcher.. and the taste is great. Thanks so much for the gallon tea bag...
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Great decaf tea for iced tea drinkers.
customer_reviews.text: I drink iced tea everyday and always have a pitcher of ice tea in my refrigerator so when my local grocer stopped carrying their brand of decaf iced tea I needed to find a replacement. I tried several other decaf teas but I like the Luzianne best. I don't always add sugar to my iced tea and the Luzianne tastes good with or without sugar. The tea does contain 5.3mg of caffeine per 8oz. serving which isn't much caffeine and still works for my because I have to watch my caffeine intake.

customer_reviews.title: Luzianne is the best!
customer_reviews.text: One of the things I learned while living in the South is how to make iced tea. While I've never been a huge fan of sweet tea, there is still only one tea to consider, if you pride yourself on a delicious, clear cup of refreshing tea, and that's Luzianne!
customer_reviews.author: P.D. MacGuire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Iced Tea!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, you look and look and try and try many different teabags and ways to make delicious iced tea. We tried these and made the tea exactly as the instructions say on the box. The tea came out amazing! If you are looking for a way to make perfect iced tea try these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kealey

customer_reviews.title: The best tea for iced tea!
customer_reviews.text: This was just a simple way to get these before we headed back to our retirement home in Mexico. Same quality and freshness as you would find in any grocery store in the U.S. Quick delivery. We are southerners, have to have iced tea, and these are not sold in Mexico. Black tea here is rare and not the same.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Most flavorless tea ive had
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst iced tea ive had. Just a watered down, bland taste. I don't taste any hibiscus. Brewed in hot water for over 5 minutes, 2 tea bags, and nothing. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris94

customer_reviews.title: I like this tea.
customer_reviews.text: Luzianne in my opinion is a very delicious tea. If you are expecting a taste similar to a Liptan, DON'T. While I love Luzianne I will tell you this, it is not everyone's cup of tea ☕ 😁. Members of my family do not care for it, so if you haven't tried it start with a smaller quantity.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: good tea
customer_reviews.text: Most reasonably priced of the hibiscus teas. Not as flavorful as a brand previously purchased, but that was drank as a hot tea & these are bags to make ice tea. I don't boil them or put into hot water - make sun tea with them. So it may be the hot water helped release more into the water with the other brand. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great taste. Makes excellent ice tea.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this tea for the first time after ordering on Amazon. It’s quite delicious. I like that the bags are oversized and they are not wrapped in any paper wrapping so I don’t have to open them before brewing. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: VitaminSea

customer_reviews.title: Best Decaf
customer_reviews.text: Luzianne Decaffeinated replaced caffeinated tea bags in our home. I am from Texas. Good iced tea is expected by guests. When we made the switch to decaf I wasn't happy with other brands. Luzianne was so good, that guest asked for the brand for their own home use. None guessed that it was decaf. Smooth, not bitter, works well in both hot and cold brew methods. Remember to make a simple syrup for sweet tea when you use the cold brew method.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Decaf Iced Tea
customer_reviews.text: I'm a really big fan of Luzianne Tea because it just makes the best-iced tea hands down. The tea never gets cloudy (or murky) when iced, there is never any bitterness from excessive tannins, and even without lemon (my preference) it still tastes great and is quite refreshing. The family size bags are perfect for making iced tea- just faster and easier than the regular sized bags. And you would never even know that this is decaf (which is a high compliment).
customer_reviews.author: G. Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Easy iced tea
customer_reviews.text: Wife makes a pitcher a day. Just drop tea bags into tap water and place in fridge. Remove tea bags later when sufficiently strong to your taste. If you are in a hurry you can use boiled water.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Woehr

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Tea. Taste like the tea I grew up with.
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a fan of the other well-known tea, but because of cost-cutting, it no longer has the flavor or bouquet I fondly remember. My son(who is also an avid ice tea fan) recommended Luzianne, and, I am completely sold. Keep up the good work Luzianne! You have a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting sweet tea
customer_reviews.text: Box was a little crumpled when I received it but that is not a reflection on the product itself. The box does say to use one tea bag I wound up using three as I like my teeth stronger than most probably. The flavor is great is easy to make. I would definitely recommend and buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne M Farnell

customer_reviews.title: Best sun tea I’ve made in years!
customer_reviews.text: The best sun tea bags around! Tastes so much better than Lipton! Never going back! I just throw 1 large bag into a glass gallon judge covered w plastic wrap (instead of the lid) and set outside for 4 hours or so, as a typical sun tea this is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Love this Tea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trying to find something that tasted good and didn’t cost a small fortune. This definitely fit the bill and I’ll definitely be buying more, everyone seems to really enjoy the tea and I’m pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and convenient to make a half gallon
customer_reviews.text: I drink a lot of iced tea and need to restrict caffeine, thus this starts off as a good match. Three large bags are enough to make around a half gallon of tea; hard to find large bags of decaf black tea in local stores. I had been enjoying Lipton for decades but this brand tastes as good and at Amazon Luzianne is available in smaller quantities than decaf Lipton so I don't have to buy an enormous supply at once.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Apollo

customer_reviews.title: If you have to move to decaf, this is the tea you need!
customer_reviews.text: Not an exact flavor match but very close to the original. My doctors said no more caffeine for a while and all I would drink at home is iced tea. Adding an extra bag to the brew makes it stronger and almost gets me to forget I'm drinking decaf.
customer_reviews.author: N. Marino

customer_reviews.title: Best Iced Tea Bags
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tea bags to make iced tea. They are the most flavorful and I have been using them for 10 years. Great value and best tea. How can you beat that combo !!!
customer_reviews.author: Count On My Review

customer_reviews.title: You can brew it dark without it getting bitter
customer_reviews.text: Other teas just get so bitter if you try to brew them dark - or they take several teabags. Luzianne can brew a really dark tea with just a normal water to teabag ratio. Also, certain other "big name" (think flow-through) decaf tea give me heartburn after as little as one cup. I can drink Luzianne all day long without any problems. Definitely my favorite "daily" tea.
customer_reviews.author: Off2sleep

customer_reviews.title: Tasty tea
customer_reviews.text: A couple bags and a full pot of water run through the drip side of my coffee maker and I have tea concentrate. Fresh lemons and sweetener for an iced tea I can drink all day in warm weather without all the caffeine.
customer_reviews.author: CaliGal

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this tea
customer_reviews.text: We want more but cannot find it. We make a gallon in cold water each day. The leaves begin to emit their color and flavor immediately. We add a little stevia or sugar to it, and it is totally refreshing with zero caffeine. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Parker

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite tea bag for making iced tea. I have cut out sodas, and I can drink this without sugar because it's not bitter. I also make mine a little weak to increase the water intake and reduce the diuretic effects of caffeine (although you can get this in a decaf version,) so each of the tea bags makes a gallon pitcher for me. Because of that, this is a great value for me. For anyone without friends from Louisiana, it's pronounced "Loo-zee-Ann" *grin*
customer_reviews.author: Lady Isarma

customer_reviews.title: Better than Lipton.
customer_reviews.text: Sweeter leaf and better Flavor than Lipton. My new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Obubba Binetin Bakon

customer_reviews.title: Tea bag ruptured in packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea. I have been ordering it for a long time. Todays box arrived and there was loose tea inside the celephane wrapper. Upon further inspection, one bag had a hole and had leaked its contents everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Hookem Horns

customer_reviews.title: Bags break open when steeping
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and value. Only problem I’ve had is that when the giant tea bag is steeping in the hot water they tend to break open. Therefore this leads to tea particles mixed into the iced tea. Must be very careful as the bags are not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this tea. The only ingredient is Hibiscus and it is delicious. Slightly tart but a must for summer especially. I add fruit or lemon - even regular tea - if I want to mix it up. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Unable to find in local stores. Just love this flavor. My only drawback was box was damaged and smashed. But this was not the sellers issue. It was the carrier issue. Since the seal on tea bags were not busted, this does not effect the product. Already into my second box. Will buy again, and again!!
customer_reviews.author: Milene McCall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Be warned that the tea bags are ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Be warned that the tea bags are strong than what I have found with other brands--perhaps a consequence of being formulated as sun tea. This is perfect more my needs, as I tend to brew and then store it cold for later use.
customer_reviews.author: fanofhistory

customer_reviews.title: One tea bag for a gallon
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can use one tea bag to make a gallon of tea. My husband and I can drink a gallon a day, especially in the Summer. This is nice that I am not counting tea bags, just pull out one bag. We have not noticed a difference in taste. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Great slightly sweetened iced tea!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted iced tea with a touch of sweet so I use a family size sweet iced tea and a family size iced tea to make for me the perfect iced tea. Luzianne is the BEST. This package has 6 boxes...fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: PMP

customer_reviews.title: Love this tea
customer_reviews.text: I'm from the south where sweet tea is a must lol growing up this was always the brand my momma bought and love that they have an option to make a gallon at a time. Lot easier and way more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Tea Bag Mess
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a box of 6 family size boxes. I opened the first one today and found a mess of tea grounds. There were about 8 bags that were not sealed and spilled in box. It took a while to check each one and make are all were free from the tea. I am worried that the other 5 boxes may be the same way, but I don’t want to open all of them and then cause them not to be fresh. Will you honor replacing them if the 2nd box is the same way?
customer_reviews.author: Kelli R

customer_reviews.title: Makes a delicious tea
customer_reviews.text: I made iced tea with it and it's my new favorite tea!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Nice strong teabags
customer_reviews.text: The Luzianne brand always delivers strong products, and these teabags are no different. I use 2 or 3 teabags to make 64 oz. sweet iced tea and keep it in my refrigerator to drink in a glass of ice. I love that I do not have to use any extra sweetener at all. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: babyboomerTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Misleading pack and size-Product GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: The product picture direction indicate this product is to brew 1 quart of tea. I was shipped individual tea bags designed to brew an 8oz cup. This is either false advertising of a miss ship. Either way I did not get what I ordered and am very disappointed. Buyer beware this is a tea bag for an 8oz cup and NOT the family sized 1 quart bag. The product previously purchased is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Crompton

customer_reviews.title: Yummy tea!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a delicious naturally caffeine free tea! I like to make it a little stronger by using more bags and letting it steep longer. Also, it improves in flavor as it sits in the refrigerator, so I make it a couple of days before an event if I can. My guests always love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Ward

customer_reviews.title: Iced tea perfection
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most of my Southern family and friends, I do not make "sweet" tea, but Luzianne needs no sugar for me. The tea actually has a "sweetness" of it's own. Refreshing every time.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Found one of these in my local Harris Teeter store over summer; fell in love, but then not restocked. Glad to find here, and so reasonably priced! For the price of one Starbucks trenta Berry Hibiscus, I can have enough of these to enjoy this year round!
customer_reviews.author: maui cruiser

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY ice tea...
customer_reviews.text: this house will use. The blend of teas is right on point for making a pitcher of the best ice tea. The only downside, is you will grade everyone else's ice tea n this, and they will lose.
customer_reviews.author: yarell

customer_reviews.title: South Louisiana Long Island Ice Tea
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried this Tea before....a Cousin suggested it to me .....There is nothing more refreshing than a fresh brewed Southern Sweet Tea with a slice of fresh Orange ... OMG it is so refreshing you will find this your go to drinks well as your friends....Try making Long Island Ice Tea using Luzianne and the other ingredients with a Big Slice of Orange and you now have another ideal cocktail...people make it your way using some Luzianne sweet tea in it on a Hot Summer Day ...There are no more words 😘
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S.

customer_reviews.title: Makes great sun tea!
customer_reviews.text: I make my sun tea in the one gallon jug containers originally obtained by buying Arizona Tea in the supermarket. Two teabags make a gallon of great tea, which I sweeten with 1/3 cup of Stevia sweetener and 2/5 cup of bottled lemon juice. It's my go-to drink in the summer. I will buy these Luzianne ice tea bags again!
customer_reviews.author: S. H. Costanzo

customer_reviews.title: Love this hibiscus tea!! Best sugar free drink
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tea ever for no sugar in drinks and not artificial sugars I put 4 tea bags in a gallon water let it sit for 10 mins and I got the best ice tea ever No brewing ever. If brew its more bitter tea. I cant have sugar or fake sugar this is the best drink I can have.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Good tea at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I use a quart jar. I put the bag in, then fill half way with hot water. Let it steep a few minutes. Take out bag. Fill remaining space with cold water. Refrigerate. Pour over ice next day. Tastes great. Makes good sweet tea as well. Try pouring some half and half into your sweet tea (like Thai iced tea) - also very good.
customer_reviews.author: Doug F.

customer_reviews.title: For Health and Good Taste
customer_reviews.text: We go through a lot of hibiscus tea (it lowers high blood pressure). I like the packaging, the taste and the speedy delivery of this product. If you have to stick to a health regime, it might as well be fun and taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Anthology

product_meta.title: Luzianne Specially Blended Iced Tea Bags, Family Size, 48-ct box (Pack of 6)
product_meta.description: Experience the tradition of Authentic Southern Foods and Beverages that capture our traditions from south Louisiana to the Outer Banks. Since 1902 we've been bringing you the flavors and refreshment that define the American South. Our assortment of refreshing iced teas, rich coffees, zesty sauces, creamy mayonnaise, and other authentically southern products will bring your family the simple joy of an afternoon on a front porch. So find your front porch with our many quality products.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: This item can only be shipped to the 48 contiguous states and to APO/FPO/DPO addresses. For APO/FPO/DPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
